name: Scrapsweeper
description:
A bullet hell game where broken enemies stick to you!

Use downed enemies to shield yourself against bullets or use them to knock other enemies away!

Controls:

WASD: Move

Mouse: Aim

Left Mouse Button: Fire / Increase volume (in title)

Right Mouse Button: Dash / Decrease volume (in title)

Notes:

The game might have some performance issues when things get hectic.

Levels are not procedural generated.

All enemies must be defeated before going into the next area.
